p: Here for determining the pharmacokinetic properties (ADME) of three major compounds, the online tool SwissADME ( http://www.swissadme.ch/) was used [ 50]. Lipinski's rule of five (M.W not more than 500; H-bond donors ≤ 5; H-bond acceptors ≤ 10; Lipophilicity < 5 and molar refractivity ranging from 40 to 130) were considered to evaluate favorable drug-like properties of all compounds [ 51]. Moreover, the toxicological properties of all the compounds were determined by the web tool admetSAR ( http://lmmd.ecust.edu.cn/admetsar2).
